description:
Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehelenia’s palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. But despite their best efforts, the two Guardians are unable to free him, and Sailor Chibi Moon fades from existence.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ai no Moon Power! Akumu no Owaru Toki
El poder lunar del amor. Se acabó la pesadilla.
Moon Power of Love: The Nightmare Ends
愛のムーンパワー! 悪夢の終わる時
